General.Name: Aydem Yenilenebilir Enerji AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Aydem Yenilenebilir Enerji A.S. engages in renewable energy generation in Turkey. The company operates 20 hydroelectric, 3 wind, and 1 geothermal power plants with a total installed capacity of 1,020 megawatts. It also produces electricity using solar and biogas resources. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Merkezefendi, Turkey. The company operates as a subsidiary of Aydem Enerji Yatirimlari Anonim Sirketi.
General.Address: No. 15/1, Hasan GOenUellUe Bulvar, Merkezefendi, Turkey
